item.title: Postdoctoral position available in Computer Science with a focus on Professional Competences and Equal Opportunities
item.description: We are hiring a postdoctoral researcher in computer science to work at the intersection of data science, education, AI bias and equal opportunities.

item.title: PhD position available in Data Science for the analysis of online communication
item.description: I am hiring a PhD student in data science for the analysis of online communication to join the Uppsala University Information Laboratory.
